full_summary:
# Tender Notice
### Acquisition Number
Sounding Set, Sonar

### Refence Number
PW-22-01017567

### Solicitation Number
W8482-230885/A

### Publication Date
December 16, 2022

### Tender Closing Date
January 12, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contact
Michael Dettorre
MICHAEL.DETTORRE@FORCES.GC.CA
455 Boul de la Carrière, Gatineau, QC, J8Y 6V7

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking a proposal for the procurement of underwater sound equipment, specifically Sounding Sets, Sonar. The requirement includes:

*   GSIN N5845, Sounding Set, Sonar, Part No. SM-5, NCAGE: 1V3B0, Speedtech Instruments, Quantity: 30 units,Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Shearwater
*   GSIN N5845, Sounding Set, Sonar, Part No. SM-5, NCAGE: 1V3B0, Speedtech Instruments, Quantity: 30 units, Unit of Issue: EA to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers. Only bids submitted in Canadian dollars will be considered.

### Mandatory Requirements

*   Preference for Canadian goods and/or services
*   Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering

### Notice URL and Documents
